eu.linksmart.dac
Interface ApplicationDeviceManager

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface ApplicationDeviceManager
extends java.rmi.Remote

Interface for the Application Device Manager. build on the DAC version by 29 September 2009

Author:
Marco Vettorello

Method Detail

getAllGateways

java.lang.String getAllGateways()
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns a list of all gateways that the Device Application Catalogue currently knows of.

Returns:
a comma-separated list of gateway names
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

resolveDevices

void resolveDevices(java.lang.String gateway,
                    java.lang.String discovermanagertype)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Initiates a resolve process for unresolved devices of a certain type on a specific gateway.

Parameters:
gateway - the gateway for physical devices
discovermanagertype - the discovery manager which should resolve the devices, for instance BluetoothDisocverymanager.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

discoverDevices

void discoverDevices(java.lang.String gateway)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Initiates a discovery process on a specific gateway. The discovery will be done for all types of devices.

Parameters:
gateway - the gateway for physical devices
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

processErrorMessage

java.lang.String processErrorMessage(java.lang.String deviceid,
                                     java.lang.String theMessage)
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Process an error message from a specific device and returns the result.

Parameters:
deviceid - the unique HID for the device
theMessage - the error message
Returns:
the result of the error processing
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getDeviceXML

java.lang.String getDeviceXML(java.lang.String deviceid,
                              java.lang.String idtype)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gives an XML description of a device in SCPD (Service Control Point Document) format.

Parameters:
deviceid - an ID for the device
idtype - the type of identifier used, values could be UDN, FriendlyName, or HID
Returns:
a string with an SPCD XML for the device
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getLinkSmartDevices

java.lang.String getLinkSmartDevices(java.lang.String gateway)
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gives a list of XML descriptions for all devices at a gateway.

Parameters:
gateway - The name of the gateway
Returns:
A string with SPCD XML for all devices at gateway
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getLinkSmartDevicesEndpoints

java.lang.String getLinkSmartDevicesEndpoints(java.lang.String gateway)
                                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gives a list of web service endpoints for all devices at a gateway.

Parameters:
gateway - the name of the gateway,if empty it will return devices for all gateways
Returns:
an XML string with pairs of device id:s and their web service endpoints
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getLinkSmartDevicesFromType

java.lang.String getLinkSmartDevicesFromType(java.lang.String gateway,
                                             java.lang.String devicetype)
                                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gives a list of XML descriptions for all LinkSmart devices at a gateway based on the device type.

Parameters:
gateway - the name of the gateway,if empty it will return devices for all gateways
devicetype - A device URN
Returns:
a string with SPCD XML:s for all devices that match the device type
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getLinkSmartDevicesFromXpath

java.lang.String getLinkSmartDevicesFromXpath(java.lang.String xpath)
                                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gives a list of XML descriptions for all devices based on a XPath selection.

Parameters:
xpath - an XPath expression that will be applied to the device XML as a selection filter. Devices that match the XPath expression, will be selected.
Returns:
a string with SPCD XML for all devices at gateway
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getUnresolvedDevices

java.lang.String getUnresolvedDevices(java.lang.String gateway)
                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Gives a list of XML descriptions for all unresolved devices at a gateway.

Parameters:
gateway - the name of the gateway,if empty it will return devices for all gateways
Returns:
a string with SPCD XML for all devices that has not yet been resolved
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

                                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the ontology description of a device as an OWL Document.

Parameters:
deviceontology_id - the ontology id for the device
Returns:
a string with an OWL description of the device

java.rmi.RemoteException

invokeLinkSmartService

java.lang.String invokeLinkSmartService(java.lang.String deviceid,
                                        java.lang.String idtype,
                                        java.lang.String method,
                                        java.lang.String arguments)
                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Allows invocation of any method offered in the general LinkSmart service of a device.

Parameters:
deviceid - the id for the device
idtype - the type of identfier used, values could be UDN, FriendlyName, or HID
method - the method to invoke
arguments - arguments to use following the format: par1=12;par2=mystring;par3=45
Returns:
a string with the result of the invocation
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

invokeService

java.lang.String invokeService(java.lang.String deviceid,
                               java.lang.String idtype,
                               java.lang.String service,
                               java.lang.String method,
                               java.lang.String arguments)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Allows invocation of any method offered in any service of a device.

Parameters:
deviceid - the id for the device
idtype - the type of identfier used, values could be UDN, FriendlyName, or HID
service - the serviceid following the format "urn:upnp-org:serviceId:weatherservice:thermometer:1"
method - the method to invoke
arguments - arguments to use following the format: par1=12;par2=mystring;par3=45
Returns:
a string with the result of the invocation
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

invokeServiceXPath

java.lang.String invokeServiceXPath(java.lang.String xpath,
                                    java.lang.String serviceid,
                                    java.lang.String method,
                                    java.lang.String arguments)
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Allows invocation of any method offered in any service on a set of devices selected by an Xpath expression.

Parameters:
xpath - an xpath expression to select devices for which the method invocation should be done
serviceid - the serviceid following the format "urn:upnp-org:serviceId:weatherservice:thermometer:1"
method - the method to invoke
arguments - arguments to use following the format: par1=12;par2=mystring;par3=45
Returns:
A string with the result of the invocation
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

addDevice

@Deprecated
java.lang.String addDevice(java.lang.String devicedescription)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Deprecated. 

Allows manual adding of devices to the network that cannot be discovered using the default discovery protocol.

Parameters:
devicedescription - An SPCD description of the device to be added
Returns:
the success of the process
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

                  java.lang.String idtype)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException

                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException

Parameters:
HID - the id for the device
Returns:
true if a device with the HID is registered otherwise false

getLinkSmartURL

java.lang.String getLinkSmartURL(java.lang.String gateway,
                                 java.lang.String deviceid,
                                 java.lang.String idtype,
                                 java.lang.String senderHID,
                                 java.lang.String sessionid)
                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns a list of LinkSmart encoded urls for the device that match with the given parameters.

Parameters:
gateway - the name of the gateway
deviceid - the id for the device
idtype - the type of identifier used, values could be UDN or FriendlyName
senderHID - he hid of the sender, normally an empty string
sessionid - the id of the session
Returns:
a list of LinkSmart encoded urls for the device
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException

Parameters:

idtype - the type of identifier used, values could be UDN or FriendlyName
Returns:
the URL associated with the web service endpoint

java.rmi.RemoteException

startDevices

void startDevices(java.lang.String xpath)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Starts devices that match a given XPath expression. The expression is applied to the SCPD XML of the device.

Parameters:
xpath - a valid XPath expression
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

stopDevices

void stopDevices(java.lang.String xpath)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Stops devices that match a given xpath expression. The expression is applied to the SCPD XML of the device.

Parameters:
xpath - a valid XPath expression
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getHID

java.lang.String getHID(java.lang.String application,
                        java.lang.String devicelocalid)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the LinkSmart ID for a device based on the local application id assinged to devices.

Parameters:
application - the application were the device resides.
devicelocalid - the local id for the device within the application for instance MyDiscoBall.
Returns:
the LinkSmart ID for the device
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getHIDsFromXPath

java.lang.String getHIDsFromXPath(java.lang.String application,
                                  java.lang.String xpath,
                                  java.lang.String hidtype)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the LinkSmart ID for a device based on an xpath description which is applied to the SCPD device model.

Parameters:
application - the application were the device resides
xpath - a valid xpath expression
hidtype - the specific LinkSmart ID to retrieve from the device ( linksmartWS, energyWS, etc)
Returns:
the LinkSmart ID for THE device
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

Parameters:
description - Old style NM description
Returns:
the LinkSmart ID for the device

java.rmi.RemoteException
